jobs.name: topCoins
jobs.description: Get top cryptocurrencies ranked by market cap with price data, volume, and trend analysis. Filter by chain (Base, Ethereum, etc.) or get global rankings.

limit.description: Number of coins to return (1-50). Default: 10

topCoins.description: Array of coins with: rank, name, symbol, price, marketCap, volume24h, circulatingSupply, change (1h/24h/7d), trend, ath, athChangePercent

summary.description: Total coins, total market cap, total volume 24h, average 24h change, chain filter
